text:
-rdEvaqyAnI#rantaqrA dyAvA#pRuthiqvI viqyanti# | 
gRuqhaiScaq sarvai$H praqjayAq nvagrEq suvOq ruhA#NAstaratAq rajA(gm)#si || 
yE dEqvA ya#j~jaqhanO# yaj~jaqmuShO# diqvyaddhyAsa#tE | 
sUryO# mAq tEByO# rakShatuq gacCE#ma suqkRutO# vaqyaM || 
yEnEndrA#ya saqmaBa#raqH payA(gg)#syuttaqmEna# haqviShA# jAtavEdaH | 
tEnA$&gnEq tvamuqta va#rddhayEqma(gm) sa#jAqtAnAq(gg)q SraiShThyaq A dhE$hyEnaM || 
yaqj~jaqhanOq vai dEqvA ya#j~jaqmuSha#H - [  ]   13
